SEARCH
Package com.financial.entries

Class PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.BudgetEntry
com.financial.entries.BudgetRevenue
com.financial.entries.PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue
All Implemented Interfaces:
BudgetRevenueLogic
Direct Known Subclasses:
PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedRevenue, PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalRevenue
public class PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue extends BudgetRevenue implements BudgetRevenueLogic
Intermediate class representing revenues from the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).

This class serves as a container for both National and Co-funded amounts, providing mechanisms to merge duplicate entries and synchronize the total investment amount with the base BudgetRevenue class.

    • publicInvestmentBudgetRevenues

      protected static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue> publicInvestmentBudgetRevenues
      Internal registry of all public investment revenue instances.

  • Constructor Details

    • PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue

      public PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue(String code, String description, String category, String type, long amount)
      Basic constructor for public investment revenue.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique financial code
      description - a brief description
      category - the financial category
      type - the investment type
      amount - the total amount

    • PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue

      public PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue(String code, String description, String category, String type, long nationalAmount, long coFundedAmount, long amount)
      Detailed constructor used primarily for creating filtered/merged investment objects. Automatically registers the instance in the static tracking list.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique financial code
      description - a brief description
      category - the financial category
      type - the investment type
      nationalAmount - the portion from national resources
      coFundedAmount - the portion from co-funded resources
      amount - the total combined amount

  • Method Details

    • sortPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenuesByCode

      public static void sortPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenuesByCode()
      Sorts the public investment revenues list alphabetically by their code. Essential before performing filtering/merging operations.

    • filterPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenues

      public static void filterPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenues()
      Merges entries with identical codes into single objects by summing their components. After merging, it triggers the creation of filtered budget revenues in DataInput.

    • getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenues

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue> getAllPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenues()
      Returns the full list of public investment revenues.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all instances

    • getMainPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenues

      public static ArrayList<PublicInvestmentBudgetRevenue> getMainPublicInvestmentBudgetRevenues()
      Retrieves top-level (2-digit code) investment revenues.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of main investment categories

    • updateAmountOfSuperClassFilteredObjects

      public void updateAmountOfSuperClassFilteredObjects(long change)
      Updates the global BudgetRevenue registry with changes from this investment entry. This ensures that the public investment totals are reflected in the overall budget view.
      Parameters:
      change - the new total investment amount for this code

      Parameters:
      newNationalAmount - the new amount (must be non-negative)
      update - if true, recalculates total amount and notifies the superclass view

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this investment entry with another for equality.

      Equality is determined by both the financial code and the investment type. This allows the system to distinguish between a National entry and a Co-funded entry that share the same budget code.

      * @param o The object to compare.
      Overrides:
      equals in class BudgetRevenue
      Parameters:
      o - The object to compare.
      Returns:
      true if codes and types match exactly.
